name: Melon Soup
keywords: gluten-free, vegetarian, melon, mint, yogurt, summer

recipeInstructions.text:
In a bowl, whisk together 2 cups yogurt, 1/4 cup milk and 1 cup
chopped mint leaves until mint is fragrant; strain and discard solids.

In another
bowl, combine the grated flesh of a medium ripe melon, 2 tablespoons lime
juice and 1 teaspoon chili powder; refrigerate bowls for 2 hours, stirring once.

To
serve, spoon yogurt onto melon and stir.
